EmailTemplate.subject: Check out what your peers at Cognizant are reading and watching
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Your peers at Cognizant seem to be studying up on cloud-native principles, microservices, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry operations. We thought you’d like to know the most popular eBooks, whitepapers, and webinars that your colleagues are reading and watching! Top 3 Cloud-Native Reads
- eBook: Beyond the 12 Factor App: Exploring the DNA of Highly Scalable, Resilient Cloud Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/beyond-the-12-factor-app?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> - eBook: Cloud-Native Foundations: Designing Change-Tolerant Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/cloud-native-designing-change-tolerant-software?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> - eBook: Cloud-Native Java: Designing Resilient Systems with Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]>
Top 3 Microservices Resources
- eBook: Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> - Webinar: Building “Bootiful” Microservices with Spring Boot <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/webinar-building-bootiful-microservices-with-spring-boot?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> - Whitepaper: Standing on the Shoulders of Giants: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]>
Top 3 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Operations Resources
- eBook: Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> - Webinar: Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.0: A First Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/dec-19-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-0-a-first-look-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> - Webinar: Continuous Delivery: Fly the Friendly CI in Pivotal Cloud Foundry with Concourse <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/oct-25-continuous-delivery-fly-the-friendly-ci-in-pivotal-cloud-foundry-with-concourse?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]>
Bonus: Rounding out the Top 10 Cognizant reading list is the Gartner Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]>.
You can bookmark this page, which includes the top 10 resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cognizantcom?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cognizant-q118]]> and feel free to share it with others you believe might be interested in Pivotal and/or the topics listed above. Warmly, Alexis Kane Director, Pivotal
